info.title: Who We Are

info.description: We provide all the necessary art supplies and instructors to help you complete your painting to your satisfaction.

info.title: How We Help
info.description: Through a cozy space, healing music, and caring guidance, we help you relieve stress and reconnect with yourself.

info.title: Create Success Stories
info.description: We help you discover a new joy, a healthy hobby after work, and bring home a healing artwork created by your own hands.

benefit.title: Benefits of Painting & Art
benefit.desc: Painting is not just about simple strokes â€” it is the story of thoughtful souls

items.title: Connect, Listen, and Heal Together
items.desc: Painting allows your soul to rest, temporarily forget all the pressures, and feel each gentle breath. Every brushstroke becomes a moment of healing and inner peace.

items.title: Enhance Creativity
items.desc: Art opens up an endless space for imagination, where you can freely create and express yourself. Every color and every line becomes part of a journey of freedom and emotional healing.

items.title: Improve Observation and Focus
items.desc: When you paint, you learn to observe details and pay attention to light, colors, and shapes. This brings calmness to the mind, strengthens patience, and trains deep concentration for inner healing.

items.title: Beautify Your Living Space
items.desc: A painting created by your own hands does not only decorate your room but also spreads warmth and peace. Each artwork leaves a personal mark that makes your living space more lively and healing.

blog.heading: Letâ€™s sit down and have a little talk!
blog.post1.title: How to Use and Take Care of Your Paint Brushes Safely
blog.post1.desc: Learn how to properly protect and care for your brushes to keep them durable, clean, and effective.
blog.post2.title: Acrylic Paint: What It Is, How to Use and Store It
blog.post2.desc: Acrylic paint is a fast-drying, durable, and flexible water-based paint widely used in modern art.
blog.post3.title: Painting With New Friends â€“ Why Not?
blog.post3.desc: Painting with friends not only helps you relieve stress but also creates fun and inspiring artworks together.
blog.post4.title: Healing Through Art â€“ From Darkness to Light
blog.post4.desc: Healing is not a one-day journey, but every brush stroke and every color slowly brings back energy, confidence, and hope.

aboutPage.heroDesc: SnapArt is not just an art workshop â€” it is an emotional journey where you can slow down in the rhythm of modern life, rediscover balance within yourself, and reconnect with your inner world through every stroke of color.

section1.title: Who We Are
section1.desc: We are a creative art studio born from a deep love for painting and a desire to spread positive values through art. At SnapArt, every artwork is not merely a creation, but a story, an emotion, and a personal imprint of the artist.

section2.title: What We Do
section2.desc: SnapArt offers a wide variety of art classes, workshops, and creative events for all ages â€” from beginners to those with experience. We not only teach drawing techniques, but also inspire creativity and empower students to express their individuality and inner world with confidence.

section3.title: How We Support You
section3.desc: SnapArt is more than a place to learn how to draw; it is a healing space where you can release stress, balance your emotions, and rediscover joy in simple moments. Each workshop is a personal journey of self-discovery and emotional renewal through art.

section4.title: Creating Meaningful Stories
section4.desc: Every customer who comes to SnapArt carries a unique story, and when they leave, they take home more than just a painting â€” they gain confidence, happiness, peace of mind, and unforgettable memories. These small stories are the greatest motivation that drives SnapArt forward.

aboutPage.endingDesc: If you are searching for a place to relax your mind, nurture your creativity, and connect with like-minded people, SnapArt is always ready to welcome you.

bannerAbout.title: Discover the Artist Within You
bannerAbout.desc: Every class at SnapArt is a journey of emotions, colors, and endless creativity.

workshopBanner.title: SnapArt Workshop
workshopBanner.subtitle: Explore, create, and heal through art

workshopAcrylic.title: ğŸ–Œ Acrylic Painting Workshop
workshopAcrylic.desc: A relaxing â€“ beginner-friendly â€“ colorful workshop for anyone who wants to try acrylic painting. You will be guided step-by-step to finish a beautiful artwork and take it home right after the session.
workshopAcrylic.introDesc1: This Acrylic workshop is designed to be simple, easy to follow, and perfect for beginners. You will learn basic acrylic techniques, brush handling, and color mixing.
workshopAcrylic.introDesc2: Our staff will guide you throughout the session so you can complete a well-composed artwork with a clear focal point. Itâ€™s a great way to relax, reduce stress, and enjoy art in a gentle way.
workshopAcrylic.fit1: Beginners who want to try acrylic painting
workshopAcrylic.fit2: Teens 14+ and adults who love art
workshopAcrylic.fit3: Friends, couples, or small weekend groups
workshopAcrylic.fit4: Anyone looking for a calm, no-pressure experience
workshopAcrylic.pricingDesc: Prices include all materials and full guidance during the workshop.
workshopAcrylic.inc1: âœ”ï¸ Paint + tools during the workshop
workshopAcrylic.inc4: âœ”ï¸ Staff support for colors & guidance
workshopAcrylic.note: * Message the fanpage to choose your size, style, and schedule.

workshopSand.title: ğŸ– Sand Art Workshop
workshopSand.desc: A gentle and relaxing workshop for beginners â€” you will create a complete sand artwork with your own personal touch.
workshopSand.introDesc1: Sand art is a creative form made from layers of colored sand, combining composition and color blending to create beautiful gradient effects. This workshop lets you experience the full process from A to Z: choosing a design, mixing colors, preparing the base, layering sand, and finishing the artwork.
workshopSand.introDesc2: No prior drawing skills are required â€” instructors guide you step by step, while staff assist with colors, composition, and framing so you can bring home a beautiful finished piece.
workshopSand.fit1: Beginners who want to explore art
workshopSand.fit4: People looking for a relaxing weekend activity
workshopSand.pricingDesc: Prices include all materials and full support during the workshop.
workshopSand.note: * Message our fanpage to choose frame, design, and schedule.

workshopTote.title: ğŸ‘œ Tote Bag Painting Workshop
workshopTote.desc: A relaxing creative workshop for beginners. You will be guided to plan your layout, mix colors, and finish a tote bag with your own personal style.
workshopTote.learn1: How to create ideas and choose a suitable concept
workshopTote.learn2: How to mix colors nicely on tote fabric
workshopTote.learn3: Basic painting techniques for clear and long-lasting artwork
workshopTote.learn4: How to take care of your tote after finishing
workshopTote.fitDesc: This workshop is perfect for students, office workers, and anyone who wants a relaxing weekend activity with friends or groups.
workshopTote.pricingDesc: The price includes all materials and full support during the workshop.
workshopTote.note: * Message our fanpage for concept suggestions and available schedules.
